scripts.build: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client && npm run migrate --prefix server && npm run seed --prefix server
scripts.start: npm run build --prefix client && npm run start --prefix server
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.deploy:clever: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "deploy" && git push clever main
